# Models

This chapter develop all the models used to explore growth and reproductive variation linked to ontogeny and environment.

## Summary

I'm suggesting to partition variance between fixed and random effects of the following model for every $Trait$ (height, diameter, branches, fruits, and flowers):

$$Trait \sim \mathcal N (\theta_0 + \theta_{soil} + \theta_{plot} + \theta_{date} \\+ \theta_{NCI}.NCI + \theta_{density}.density  + \theta_{soil}.soil \\ + \theta_{openness}.openness + \theta_{shore}.shore, \sigma_{Residual}) \\ \theta_{plot} \sim \mathcal N(0,\sigma_{plot}) \\ \theta_{date} \sim \mathcal N(0,\sigma_{date})$$
